snippet: Joe Paterno’s family vowed Monday their own investigation of the Jerry Sandusky scandal, rejecting the findings of a special investigator who concluded Paterno and others concealed the abuse.
abstract: Joe Paterno’s family vows their own investigation of the Jerry Sandusky scandal, rejecting the findings of a special investigator who concluded Paterno and others concealed the abuse; Penn State student group renames area outside the football stadium from Paternoville to Nittanyville.
lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno’s family vowed Monday their own investigation of the Jerry Sandusky scandal, rejecting the findings of a special investigator who concluded Paterno and others concealed the abuse.
